body:
what was your first minecraft house like?

mine was a house made out of cactus with a sandstone floor and roof

this was back in beta, forget the exact version but the nether existed but didnt work in multiplayer

mobs were really dumb back then and kept walking into my cactus walls only to die and give me free loot

this was back in beta, forget the exact version but the nether existed but didnt work in multiplayer

mobs were really dumb back then and kept walking into my cactus walls only to die and give me free loot

body: While everyone else made a dirt hut I mined into the side of a cave and put up a door which is much easier than removing and placing blocks and easy access to a mine.

body:
Mine was a dirt square 3 stories high with lighting only on the top floor. The second floor was made of glass panes that I'd always fall through. I didnt know how light levels worked so I kinda just lived with mobs spawning in my house for a while.

God I was a dumbass back then.
body_html:
Mine was a dirt square 3 stories high with lighting only on the top floor. The second floor was made of glass panes that I'd always fall through. I didnt know how light levels worked so I kinda just lived with mobs spawning in my house for a while.

God I was a dumbass back then.

body:
An ice house with only a door and a few blocks of space is the first I can remember. Except it was technically dark green wool retextured as ice, on Minecraft PE Lite.

That was back when my brain was still capable of having fun.
body_html:
An ice house with only a door and a few blocks of space is the first I can remember. Except it was technically dark green wool retextured as ice, on Minecraft PE Lite.

That was back when my brain was still capable of having fun.

post.body:
what was your first minecraft house like?

mine was a house made out of cactus with a sandstone floor and roof

this was back in beta, forget the exact version but the nether existed but didnt work in multiplayer

mobs were really dumb back then and kept walking into my cactus walls only to die and give me free loot
post.body_html:
what was your first minecraft house like?

mine was a house made out of cactus with a sandstone floor and roof

this was back in beta, forget the exact version but the nether existed but didnt work in multiplayer

mobs were really dumb back then and kept walking into my cactus walls only to die and give me free loot
post.title: first minecraft house

author.bio: I do programming and memes. Also I like food.
author.bio_html: I do programming and memes. Also I like food.

body: Mine was a dirt rectangle without windows with a wooden roof that I made out of full blocks because I didn't know stairs existed.
body_html: Mine was a dirt rectangle without windows with a wooden roof that I made out of full blocks because I didn't know stairs existed.
